PropagatorFactory¶

class orbitpy.propagator.PropagatorFactory[source]¶

Factory class which allows to register and invoke the appropriate propagator class.

J2AnalyticalPropagator class is registered in the factory. Additional user-defined propagator classes can be registered as shown below:

Usage:

factory = orbitpy.PropagatorFactory()
factory.register_propagator('SGP4', SGP4Propagator)
prop = factory.get_propagator('SGP4')
Variables

_creators (dict) – Dictionary mapping propagator type label to the appropriate propagator class.

Methods Summary

__init__()

get_propagator(specs)

Function to get the appropriate propagator instance.

register_propagator(_type, creator)

Function to register propagators.

Methods Documentation

__init__()[source]¶
get_propagator(specs)[source]¶

Function to get the appropriate propagator instance.

Variables

specs – Propagator specifications which also contains a valid propagator type in the “@type” dict key. The propagator type is valid if it has been registered with the PropagatorFactory instance.

Returns

The appropriate propagator object initialized to the input specifications.

Return type

orbitpy.propagator.J2AnalyticalPropagator or custom propagator class.

register_propagator(_type, creator)[source]¶

Function to register propagators.

Variables

  • _type (str) – Propagator type (label).

  • creator (Propagator class.) – Propagator class.
